backend/main.mo: Defines the canister actor and a large set of public types for activities, reminders, journals, finances, habits, and user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Lists evidence for a feature request removing footer text, including affected file, components, and test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their roles and UI behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS variables and themes for light and dark modes with OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading Nunito font and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling theming, layout, date selection, profile setup gating, and routing between daily and main dashboards.
frontend/src/components/activities/Daily: Renders a daily timeline of activities with hour markers and proportional colored segments.
frontend/src/components/AppButton.tsx: Wrapper around the UI Button component applying a shared app-button class.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Monthly calendar component with reminder indicators, month navigation, and date selection.
frontend/src/components/charts/PiePercen: Custom Recharts pie slice percentage label positioned inside slices with mobile sizing.
frontend/src/components/DailyDashboard.t: Daily dashboard with tabbed sections for overview, activities, finance, habits, and journal.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer container with layout preserved and all branding text removed.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation header with theme toggle, view switching, and user auth menu handling logout and profile loading.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login button that triggers Internet Identity login and retries on stale sessions.
frontend/src/components/MainDashboard.ts: Main dashboard showing multiâ€‘day finance, habit, and activity trend charts with timeframe switching.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating or repairing a user profile by submitting a username.
frontend/src/components/sections/DailyOv: Daily overview section aggregating activities, finances, habits, and journal data into charts.
frontend/src/components/sections/Finance: Displays daily finance entries, allows creating and deleting items, and shows income/expense/investment distribution via a pie chart.
frontend/src/components/sections/HabitsS: Manages daily habits with create, update, delete, and completion toggling, plus a pie chart summarizing progress.
frontend/src/components/sections/Journal: Loads, edits, and saves a daily journal entry with autoset content and identity-gated saving.
frontend/src/components/sections/Overvie: Handles creation and deletion of daily activities, computes durations, groups entries, and displays them in a timeline.
frontend/src/components/sections/Reminde: Manages daily reminders with add and delete actions and displays them in a styled card.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and maintains a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity, handling identity loading, login, logout, and authentication status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: React hook that tracks if the viewport width is below 768px.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, activities, and setup status using an actor and identity.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables, themes, typography, and component styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/utils/activityColors.ts: Generates deterministic OKLCH-based activity colors using string hashing.
frontend/src/utils/activityTime.ts: Utility functions for parsing times and sorting activities by time of day.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes backend error objects into user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/localDate.ts: Local date helpers for formatting, parsing, generating ranges, and validating YYYY-MM-DD strings without timezone issues.
frontend/src/utils/timelineStyles.ts: Builds gradient and glow styles for timeline segments based on OKLCH colors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove sensitive values from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project's state, features, and architecture, including authentication, frontend tech stack, and backend capabilities.
